Topic.Title: SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier on Squiffy for Windows

Posts.EditableText:
It give me a SyntaxError: Unexpected identifier on Squiffy for Windows, but when I use the browser-based squiffy, it works. What is wrong with it?
Code I use:
@title The Cave: A D&D STORY (NOT FINISHED)

You wake up, unknown to where you are. You see that you have fallen down a hole, and there are two paths, leading to two caves. There is a [[passage to your right]], and a [[passage to your left]].
[[passage to your right]]:
You decide to walk down the right passage, and you see a torch. Will you [[pick up the torch]], or [[leave it]]?
[[passage to your left]]:
You decide to walk down the passage to the left, and you see a strange creature almost instantly! Are you going to [[fight it]], or run away and into the [[passage to your right]]?
[[fight it]]:
Fighting it was a horrible mistake, as it turns around and knocks you off of your feet, killing you instantly as you hit the jagged wall. 
<font size="7"><b>GAME OVER</b></font>
[[pick up the torch]]:
Picking up the torch helps you see better instantly. You run into a small [[bunny-looking creature]].
[[leave it]]:
You can barely see, but there seems to be a [[bunny-looking creature]] that you can see.
[[bunny-looking creature]]:
The creature seems harmless, but you are starving.
<center>[[FIGHT]]</center>
<center>[[SPARE]]</center>
[[FIGHT]]:
You kill the bunny-looking creature, and obtain <b>FUR</b> and <b>RAW MEAT</b>. [[Continue with your quest]]
[[SPARE]]:
The bunny creature grows into a giant and squashes you...
<font size="7"><center><b>GAME OVER</b></center></font>
[[Continue with your quest]]:
You can see in the distance a small town built with the shambles of the cave. 
<center>[[CHECK IT OUT]]</b></center>
<center>[[IGNORE IT]]</center>
[[IGNORE IT]]:
You try going around the town, but are confronted by a cop, and he asks for your name.
[[SAY: I can't remember.]]
[[CHECK IT OUT]]:
Entering the town, you are confronted by a cop, and he asks for your name.
[[SAY: I can't remember.]]
[[SAY: I can't remember.]]:
The cop shouts "What?! You can't even remember your name?!" and furiously blindsides you with a bat, knocking you out cold. 
[[What happens next?!]]
[[What happens next?!]]:
You find yourself in a cell, alongside someone that looks oddly familiar.
[[Talk to the cellmate]]
[[Talk to the cellmate]]:
You decide to talk to the cellmate.
[[ASK: What is your name?]]
[[ASK: What is your name?]]:
He says "I cannot remember, and that is why I am in here." Right as he finishes, the guard, who just so happens to be the same cop, bangs on the cell door and shouts "Shut up in there! I don't wanna her your yappin'!"
[[A few hours later...]]
[[A few hours later...]]:
You are called by the guard to a trial, to decide your fate. In the trial room, the judge says "

Posts.EditableText:
Are you using the latest version of Squiffy offline? Should be V5.0 - see Alex's blog [url=http://www.textadventures.co.uk/blog/feed/:1sk4zmke]here[/url:1sk4zmke]
I ran your code without any errors here. Ran down all branches without any problems.
